total.description: The total number of products returned. Deprecated.

totalResults.description: The total number of products returned.

totalExpandedResults.description: The total number of expanded products is returned only if value for category Id is set in the request.

limit.description: the total number of products that can be returned

property.description: The property on which to do the ordering of products.

order.description: The order in which the products should be listed(asc/desc).

items.description: Images and urls of the product. Image Urls are not encoded.

longDescription.description: The long description of the product

primaryThumbImageURL.description: the primary source image of the url. Url is not encoded.

largeImage.description: the large image of the product. Url is not encoded.

smallImage.description: The array of small image URLs. Urls are not encoded.

nonreturnable.description: Indicates whether the product is returnable or not.

displayName.description: The display name of the product

orderLimit.description: the order limit of the product

primaryFullImageURL.description: The url of the primary full image. Url is not encoded.

listPrices.description: list prices of the SKU in respective price list groups

salePrices.description: sale prices of the product in respective price list groups

plg1.description: sale price of the product in plg1

plg2.description: sale price of the product in plg2

productVariantOptions.description: Objects containing product's variant options details if available for the product.

optionValueMap.description: mapping of all option values with corresponding option value ids

largeImageURLs.description: The array of large image URLs. Urls are not encoded.

addOnProducts.description: List of add-on products associated with the product

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the configurable property

addOnOptions.description: List of options within a configurable Property

product.description: The add-on product associated with product

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the product

active.description: Flag indicating if the product is active

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the add-on option

sku.description: The add-on sku associated with product

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the sku

active.description: Flag indicating if the sku is active

smallImageURLs.description: The urls of the small image.Urls are not encoded.

shippingSurcharges.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the product in respective price list groups

plg1.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the product in plg1

plg2.description: Extra handling costs for shipping the product in plg2

childSKUs.description: List of SKU's for the product.

dynamicPropertyMapLong.description: The dynamic mapping of the product

largeImage.description: The large image of the product

smallImage.description: The small image of the product

salePriceEndDate.description: The date from which the sale for this product is not valid

salePriceStartDate.description: The date from which sale price of the product is valid

salePrice.description: The sale price of the product

primaryMediumImageURL.description: Primary Medium Image URL ID of SKU.

listingSKUId.description: It contains listing variant's repository id, this field will be available if query param has includeChildSKUsListingIds as true and if product is style based one.

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the product

shippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost for shipping the product.

primarySourceImageURL.description: Primary Source Image URL of SKU.

primarySmallImageURL.description: Primary Small Image URL of SKU.

listPrice.description: The list price of the product

secondaryCurrencyShippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost for shipping the product in monetary currency. In case of mix currency, if payShippingInSecondaryCurrency flag is set to true and the secondaryCurrencyCode is set at site, this amount will be calculated according to the exchange rate defined between selected priceListGroup's currency code and site's secondary currency code

salePrice.description: The sale price of the product

primaryMediumImageURL.description: The primary medium image URL of the product. Url is not encoded.

fullImageURLs.description: The array of full image URLs. Urls are not encoded.

active.description: The active property of the product

thumbImageURLs.description: The array of thumbnail image URLs. Urls are not encoded.

primaryLargeImageURLs.description: The url of the primary large image. Url is not encoded.

variantValuesOrder.description: Object having various variant property as key and ordered values array as the value.

route.description: The route property of the product

notForIndividualSale.description: States whether not a product may be sold individually rather than, for example, as part of a configured product

primarySourceImageURL.description: the primary source image of the url.Url is not encoded.

primarySmallImageURL.description: The primary small image URL of the product. Url is not encoded.
